attributes.additional_details:
Fracking dangers to the environment & your health inc; water contamination, sickness, premature births, cancer, organ damage, death, oil spills, earthquakes, chemical exposure, housing market decreases, noise, air, light & soil pollution!

Communities should have a say in whether fracking takes place & we are entitled to full disclosure of development plans, impacts of drilling, risks, construction, locations, & safer alternatives!

frackfreeunited.co.uk
foodandwaterwatch.org
frack-off.org.uk
attributes.background: Fracking is a dangerous method of drilling for oil & gas trapped in shale rocks deep in the earth. Fracking will be classed as a 'Nationally Significant Infrastructure Project' which can allow drilling to take place with no planning permission! Sign this petition now to ban fracking in England!
